pages.text:
Candlelight Manor
55+ Active Living in South Daytona, Florida
Candlelight Manor offers a tranquil retreat on 18 tree-filled acres, just minutes from the action of Daytona Beach and the famous Daytona International Speedway. Our active 55+ community offers a selection of gorgeous homes on tree-lined streets with lush landscaping. Residents have exclusive use of a range of amenities and services, including our clubhouse with billiards, library, computer center, meeting rooms, and fitness center. Outdoors, residents have a duck pond & walking trail, shuffleboard, horseshoes, and sparkling swimming pool and hot tub to enjoy.  Discover a higher standard of living in coastal Florida, at Candlelight Manor.
View Homes
about 55+ Active Living in South Daytona, Florida

Amenities and Activities
Settle down in the beautiful Sunshine State at Candlelight Manor. Embrace an active and social lifestyle with a variety of amenities and activities.

Find Your Dream Home
Candlelight Manor
Discover
Just a short drive from the Atlantic Ocean and the sands of Daytona Beach, residents enjoy a plethora of activities and attractions. Get in touch with nature or refine your swing at several nearby golf courses. Enjoy high-octane racing at Daytona International Speedway. With easy access to major highways and an ideal location in South Daytona, our community offers easy access for outdoor fun, entertainment, and the attractions of the Florida coast. Head to Orlando and discover the enchantment of Disney World.
Things to Do
Airports
The Shoppes at One Daytona
Daytona Beach - The World's Most Famous Beach
Living Legends of Auto Racing
Sunglow Fishing Pier
Daytona International Speedway
Daytona Beach International Airport (DAB)
Orlando Sanford International Airport (SFB)

Candlelight Manor
Contact Us
FAQ Contact Us
Is South Daytona, Florida, a good place to live?
Is South Daytona, Florida, a good place to live?
South Daytona is one of Florida's top destinations for those seeking a new home. Visit Daytona Boardwalk Amusements, the Museum of Arts & Sciences, Canaveral National Seashore, and Dunlawton Sugar Mill Gardens.
How much is a new manufactured home in South Daytona, Florida?
How much is a new manufactured home in South Daytona, Florida?
The cost of our quality-built manufactured homes varies. We offer many
affordable homes
with access to complimentary community amenities for even more value. Please contact our team for pricing and more information.
What recreational activities are offered at Candlelight Manor?
What recreational activities are offered at Candlelight Manor?
Candlelight Manor features exceptional activities and recreational facilities, including a heated swimming pool, lake, billiards, library, horseshoes, hot tub, and a community center to enjoy community events. Enjoy excellent
amenities
in the place you call home.
What are the best attractions in South Daytona, Florida?
What are the best attractions in South Daytona, Florida?
The best attractions of South Daytona close to our community are The Shoppes at One Daytona, Daytona Beach—The World's Most Famous Beach, Living Legends of Auto Racing, Sunglow Fishing Pier, and Daytona International Speedway.

Candlelight Manor - Amenities and Activities
Candlelight Manor - Amenities and Activities
55+ Active Living in South Daytona, Florida
Candlelight Manor blends a vibrant 55+ community with a tranquil retreat on 18 leafy acres, just a few miles from the shores of Daytona Beach. Our beautiful neighborhood offers a range of amenities and features for a fun and fabulous lifestyle on the Florida coast. Neighbors become friends playing shuffleboard and horseshoes. Relax in the heated swimming pool or meet in the clubhouse for games and social events. Stroll down tree-lined streets or jog around the duck pond. Settle down and live your best life in the beautiful Sunshine State.
Clubhouse
Neighbors become friends in our community clubhouse where you can enjoy card tables, billiards, a library, and free Wi-Fi. Become an active and engaged member of our community.
Swimming Pool
Dive into relaxation in our heated outdoor swimming pool. Enjoy a refreshing swim, lounge on poolside chairs, and soak up the Florida sunshine as you socialize with friends.
Shuffleboard & Horseshoes
Hang out with new neighbors playing games on our shuffleboard court or enjoy a lively match at the community horseshoe pit.
Hot Tub
Indulge in relaxation in our hot tub. Unwind and rejuvenate in the soothing warm waters and ease body and soul.
Pond
Relax by our duck pond and immerse yourself in the beauty of nature and tranquility. Take a stroll down tree-lined streets and enjoy the lush landscaping.
All Amenities
Experience vibrant and social community living in our beautiful neighborhood. Relaxing by the pool, playing cards in the clubhouse, and the joys of retirement on the Florida coast.
Heated Swimming Pool
Clubhouse with Fully Equipped Kitchen
Sundeck
Library
Lake

Cookie Consent Manager
When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.
Required Cookies
These cookies are required to use this website and can't be turned off.

SAP as service provider
We use the following session cookies, which are all required to enable the website to function:
"route" is used for session stickiness
"careerSiteCompanyId" is used to send the request to the correct data center
"JSESSIONID" is placed on the visitor's device during the session so the server can identify the visitor
"Load balancer cookie" (actual cookie name may vary)  prevents a visitor from bouncing from one instance to another
Advertising Cookies
These cookies serve ads that are relevant to your interests. You may freely choose to accept or decline these cookies at any time. Note that certain functionality that these third parties make available may be impacted if you do not accept these cookies.
